name: *Rogue-Like In Development*
description:
Controls:

  • Move - WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Confirm - Enter
  • Pick up - G
  • Character Info - C
  • View - V
  • Drop - D
  • Quit - ESC

**I know this is very similar to the OG Rogue, I am not trying to make a clone **

This is my Passion Project, I am starting off with very basic stuff at the moment so I can have a good foundation to build up to what I have in mind for my Rogue-Like game. This is heavily early but if anyone plays this I would love any feedback on anything, but please remember this is very bare bones (LOL) at the moment.
